name: Last Journey (Prepe)
description:
Rouge got hurt on his last journey and is about to die. His last wish is to die at the grave where his beloved wife is burried.

Game contains a main screen to get a feel for the controls and 2 levels of which 1 gets randomly chosen to be your journey. But you only have 5 min to complete the level. During  the first 4 min only the colors will fade and you only have black and white colors for your last min.
